QuestData.Title: The Seal is Broken
QuestData.Description: <Cho looks at you in disbelief.>$b$bI... I thought Sha of this immensity were a myth - we all did. Just a story to keep our children from fighting.$b$bNo time to talk now. Those fissures - they're feeding it... it grows stronger by the moment!$b$bI must research the scrolls from my family archives. You, take this cannon and ride Mishi.$b$bYou must find a way to contain this horror that has been unleashed!
QuestData.LogDescription: Seal 12 Sha Fissures to banish the Sha of Doubt.
QuestData.RewardText: I have much research to do in very little time.$b$bThe emperor's message only warned of the unique threat war would bring to our land - this... Sha.$b$bSadly, the time to heed his message has passed. And as for how to bring an end to the crisis, the Emperor's Omen is silent.
